symbols.name: initializeUserPermissions
symbols.description_one_line: Initializes a Firebase listener for real-time user permission updates.

details.what_it_does: Sets up a Firestore listener on the nx-users collection to track user permissions. Accepts either phone number or email for querying. Immediately parses existing permissions and provides a callback for updates. Returns both unsubscribe function and initial permissions object.

params.name: phoneNumber
params.description: User's phone number (normalizes to both local and international formats)

params.name: firstTimeArray
params.description: Array of collection paths to include in initial load

params.name: getUpdatePermissions
params.description: Callback invoked on initial load and whenever user permissions change

returns.description: Promise resolving to unsubscribe function and initial permissions

minimal_correct.title: Initialize permissions with email

extensive_correct.title: Initialize with phone and handle updates in React

incorrect_pattern.title: Common mistake: Not unsubscribing from listener
